00041 /* Private constants ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00042 /** @defgroup MCTM_Private_Define MCTM private definitions
00043   * @{
00044   */
00045 #define CTR_COMPRE          0x00000100ul
00046 #define CTR_COMUS           0x00000200ul
00047 
00048 #define CHBRKCTR_CHMOE      0x00000010ul
00049 /**
00050   * @}
00051   */

00059 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00060  * @brief Configure polarity of the MCTMx channel N.
00061  * @param MCTMx: where MCTMx is the selected MCTM from the MCTM peripheral.
00062  * @param Channel: Specify the MCTM channel.
00063  *        This parameter can be one of the following values:
00064  *        @arg MCTM_CH_0 : MCTM channel 0
00065  *        @arg MCTM_CH_1 : MCTM channel 1
00066  *        @arg MCTM_CH_2 : MCTM channel 2
00067  *        @arg MCTM_CH_3 : MCTM channel 3
00068  * @param Pol: Specify the polarity of channel N.
00069  *        This parameter can be one of the following values:
00070  *        @arg MCTM_CHP_NONINVERTED : active high
00071  *        @arg MCTM_CHP_INVERTED    : active low
00072  * @retval None
00073  ************************************************************************************************************/
00074 void MCTM_ChNPolarityConfig(HT_TM_TypeDef* MCTMx, TM_CH_Enum Channel, TM_CHP_Enum Pol)
00075 {
00076   u32 wChpolr;
00077 
00078   /* Check the parameters                                                                                   */
00079   Assert_Param(IS_MCTM(MCTMx));
00080   Assert_Param(IS_MCTM_COMPLEMENTARY_CH(Channel));
00081   Assert_Param(IS_TM_CHP(Pol));
00082 
00083   /* Set or reset the CHxN polarity                                                                         */
00084   wChpolr = MCTMx->CHPOLR & (~(u32)(0x2 << (Channel << 1)));
00085   MCTMx->CHPOLR = wChpolr | ((Pol << 1) << (Channel << 1));
00086 }
00087 
00088 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00089  * @brief Enable or Disable the MCTMx channel N.
00090  * @param MCTMx: where MCTMx is the selected MCTM from the MCTM peripheral.
00091  * @param Channel: Specify the MCTM channel.
00092  *        This parameter can be one of the following values:
00093  *        @arg MCTM_CH_0 : MCTM channel 0
00094  *        @arg MCTM_CH_1 : MCTM channel 1
00095  *        @arg MCTM_CH_2 : MCTM channel 2
00096  *        @arg MCTM_CH_3 : MCTM channel 3
00097  * @param Control: This parameter can be TM_CHCTL_ENABLE or TM_CHCTL_DISABLE.
00098  * @retval None
00099  ************************************************************************************************************/
00100 void MCTM_ChannelNConfig(HT_TM_TypeDef* MCTMx, TM_CH_Enum Channel, TM_CHCTL_Enum Control)
00101 {
00102   /* Check the parameters                                                                                   */
00103   Assert_Param(IS_MCTM(MCTMx));
00104   Assert_Param(IS_MCTM_COMPLEMENTARY_CH(Channel));
00105   Assert_Param(IS_TM_CHCTL(Control));
00106 
00107   /* Reset the CHxNE Bit                                                                                    */
00108   MCTMx->CHCTR &= ~(u32)(0x2 << (Channel << 1));
00109 
00110   /* Set or reset the CHxNE Bit                                                                             */
00111   MCTMx->CHCTR |= (u32)(Control << 1) << (Channel << 1);
00112 }
00113 
00114 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00115  * @brief Enable or Disable the channels main output of the MCTMx.
00116  * @param MCTMx: where MCTMx is the selected MCTM from the MCTM peripherals.
00117  * @param NewState: This parameter can be ENABLE or DISABLE.
00118  * @retval None
00119  ************************************************************************************************************/
00120 void MCTM_CHMOECmd(HT_TM_TypeDef* MCTMx, ControlStatus NewState)
00121 {
00122   /* Check the parameters                                                                                   */
00123   Assert_Param(IS_MCTM(MCTMx));
00124   Assert_Param(IS_CONTROL_STATUS(NewState));
00125 
00126   if (NewState != DISABLE)
00127   {
00128     /* Enable the MCTM Main Output                                                                          */
00129     MCTMx->CHBRKCTR |= CHBRKCTR_CHMOE;
00130   }
00131   else
00132   {
00133     /* Disable the MCTM Main Output                                                                         */
00134     MCTMx->CHBRKCTR &= ~CHBRKCTR_CHMOE;
00135   }
00136 }
00137 
00138 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00139  * @brief Configure the break feature, dead time, Lock level, the OSSI, the OSSR State
00140  *        and the CHAOE(automatic output enable).
00141  * @param MCTMx: where MCTMx is the selected MCTM from the MCTM peripherals.
00142  * @param CHBRKCTRInit: Point to a MCTM_CHBRKCTRInitTypeDef structure.
00143  * @retval None
00144  ************************************************************************************************************/
00145 void MCTM_CHBRKCTRConfig(HT_TM_TypeDef* MCTMx, MCTM_CHBRKCTRInitTypeDef *CHBRKCTRInit)
00146 {
00147   u32 wTmpReg;
00148 
00149   /* Check the parameters                                                                                   */
00150   Assert_Param(IS_MCTM(MCTMx));
00151   Assert_Param(IS_MCTM_OSSR_STATE(CHBRKCTRInit->OSSRState));
00152   Assert_Param(IS_MCTM_OSSI_STATE(CHBRKCTRInit->OSSIState));
00153   Assert_Param(IS_MCTM_LOCK_LEVEL(CHBRKCTRInit->LockLevel));
00154   Assert_Param(IS_MCTM_BREAK_STATE(CHBRKCTRInit->Break0));
00155   Assert_Param(IS_MCTM_BREAK_POLARITY(CHBRKCTRInit->Break0Polarity));
00156   Assert_Param(IS_MCTM_CHAOE_STATE(CHBRKCTRInit->AutomaticOutput));
00157   Assert_Param(IS_TM_FILTER(CHBRKCTRInit->BreakFilter));
00158 
00159   wTmpReg = MCTMx->CHBRKCTR & 0x00000010; // Keep CHMOE
00160   wTmpReg |= (u32)CHBRKCTRInit->BreakFilter << 8;
00161   wTmpReg |= (u32)CHBRKCTRInit->DeadTime << 24;
00162   wTmpReg |= CHBRKCTRInit->LockLevel | CHBRKCTRInit->OSSRState | CHBRKCTRInit->OSSIState;
00163   wTmpReg |= CHBRKCTRInit->Break0 | CHBRKCTRInit->Break0Polarity | CHBRKCTRInit->AutomaticOutput;
00164 
00165   MCTMx->CHBRKCTR = wTmpReg;
00166 }
00167 
00168 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00169  * @brief Configure the break feature, dead time, Lock level, the OSSI, the OSSR State
00170  *        and the CHAOE(automatic output enable).
00171  * @param MCTMx: where MCTMx is the selected MCTM from the MCTM peripherals.
00172  * @param CHBRKCTRInit: Point to a MCTM_CHBRKCTRTypeDef structure.
00173  * @retval None
00174  ************************************************************************************************************/
00175 void MCTM_CHBRKCTRConfig2(HT_TM_TypeDef* MCTMx, MCTM_CHBRKCTRTypeDef *CHBRKCTRInit)
00176 {
00177   u32 wTmpReg;
00178 
00179   wTmpReg = MCTMx->CHBRKCTR & 0x00000010; // Keep CHMOE
00180 
00181   wTmpReg |= CHBRKCTRInit->Reg;
00182 
00183   MCTMx->CHBRKCTR = wTmpReg;
00184 }
00185 
00186 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00187  * @brief Fill each CHBRKCTRInitStruct member with its default value.
00188  * @param CHBRKCTRInitStruct: Point to a MCTM_CHBRKCTRInitTypeDef structure.
00189  * @retval None
00190  ************************************************************************************************************/
00191 void MCTM_CHBRKCTRStructInit(MCTM_CHBRKCTRInitTypeDef* CHBRKCTRInitStruct)
00192 {
00193   /* Set the default configuration                                                                          */
00194   CHBRKCTRInitStruct->OSSRState = MCTM_OSSR_STATE_DISABLE;
00195   CHBRKCTRInitStruct->OSSIState = MCTM_OSSI_STATE_DISABLE;
00196   CHBRKCTRInitStruct->LockLevel = MCTM_LOCK_LEVEL_OFF;
00197   CHBRKCTRInitStruct->DeadTime = 0x00;
00198   CHBRKCTRInitStruct->Break0 = MCTM_BREAK_DISABLE;
00199   CHBRKCTRInitStruct->Break0Polarity = MCTM_BREAK_POLARITY_LOW;
00200   CHBRKCTRInitStruct->BreakFilter = 0;
00201   CHBRKCTRInitStruct->AutomaticOutput = MCTM_CHAOE_DISABLE;
00202 }
00203 
00204 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00205  * @brief Enable or Disable MCTMx COMPRE function.
00206  * @param MCTMx: where MCTMx is the selected MCTM from the MCTM peripherals.
00207  * @param NewState: This parameter can be ENABLE or DISABLE.
00208  * @retval None
00209  ************************************************************************************************************/
00210 void MCTM_COMPRECmd(HT_TM_TypeDef* MCTMx, ControlStatus NewState)
00211 {
00212   /* Check the parameters                                                                                   */
00213   Assert_Param(IS_MCTM(MCTMx));
00214   Assert_Param(IS_CONTROL_STATUS(NewState));
00215 
00216   if (NewState != DISABLE)
00217   {
00218     /* Enable the MCTM COMPRE                                                                               */
00219     MCTMx->CTR |= CTR_COMPRE;
00220   }
00221   else
00222   {
00223     /* Disable the MCTM COMPRE                                                                              */
00224     MCTMx->CTR &= ~CTR_COMPRE;
00225   }
00226 }
00227 
00228 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00229  * @brief Configure the MCTMx COMUS function.
00230  * @param MCTMx: where MCTMx is the selected MCTM from the MCTM peripherals.
00231  * @param Sel: Specify the COMUS value.
00232  *   This parameter can be one of the following values:
00233  *     @arg MCTM_COMUS_STIOFF : MCTM capture/compare control bits are updated by setting the UEV2G bit only
00234  *     @arg MCTM_COMUS_STION  : MCTM capture/compare control bits are updated by both setting the UEV2G bit
00235  *                              or when a rising edge occurs on STI
00236  * @retval None
00237  ************************************************************************************************************/
00238 void MCTM_COMUSConfig(HT_TM_TypeDef* MCTMx, MCTM_COMUS_Enum Sel)
00239 {
00240   /* Check the parameters                                                                                   */
00241   Assert_Param(IS_MCTM(MCTMx));
00242   Assert_Param(IS_MCTM_COMUS(Sel));
00243 
00244   if (Sel != MCTM_COMUS_STIOFF)
00245   {
00246     /* Set the MCTM COMUS bit                                                                               */
00247     MCTMx->CTR |= CTR_COMUS;
00248   }
00249   else
00250   {
00251     /* Clear the MCTM COMUS bit                                                                             */
00252     MCTMx->CTR &= ~CTR_COMUS;
00253   }
00254 }
00255 
00256 #if (LIBCFG_MCTM_UEV1DIS)
00257 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00258  * @brief Enable or Disable Overflow/Underflow update event(does not contain interrupt) of the MCTMx.
00259  * @param MCTMx: where MCTMx is the selected MCTM from the MCTM peripherals.
00260  * @param MCTM_UEV1x: MCTM_UEV1UD or MCTM_UEV1OD. Overflow/underflow request disable control.
00261  * @param NewState: This parameter can be SET or RESET.
00262  * @retval None
00263  ************************************************************************************************************/
00264 void MCTM_UpdateEventDisable(HT_TM_TypeDef* MCTMx, MCTM_UEV1DIS_Enum MCTM_UEV1x, FlagStatus NewState)
00265 {
00266   /* Check the parameters                                                                                   */
00267   Assert_Param(IS_MCTM(MCTMx));
00268   Assert_Param(IS_CONTROL_STATUS(NewState));
00269 
00270   if (NewState != RESET)
00271   {
00272     /* Set the update disable bit                                                                           */
00273     MCTMx->CNTCFR |= MCTM_UEV1x;
00274   }
00275   else
00276   {
00277     /* Reset the update disable bit                                                                         */
00278     MCTMx->CNTCFR &= ~MCTM_UEV1x;
00279   }
00280 }
00281 #endif

00283   * @}
00284   */
